original_title: ESPN Greatest Games: Penn State 1983 Sugar Bowl
overview: The thrill of the 1983 Sugar Bowl lives again in this vintage ESPN broadcast. Sugar Bowl 49 finds the No. 2 Nittany Lions, featuring future Seahawk and hall-of-famer Curt Warner, battling the top-ranked Georgia Bulldogs for the SEC Championship. The program, presented in its entirety, gives fans a glimpse of Warner and other future pros -- such as Gregg Garrity, Herschel Walker, Kevin Butler and Todd Blackledge -- early in their careers.
title: ESPN Greatest Games: Penn State 1983 Sugar Bowl
